description: Cross vine (Bignonia capreolata 'Atrosanguinea') is an amazing plant species that will really light up your garden. It produces beautiful, reddish-purple flowers in the spring and summer and its glossy, evergreen foliage will definitely draw attention. This species is also resistant to disease and pests, and it's even able to grow in locations with poor soil composition. It also has a unique, climbing growth habit that can be trained to cover trellises or other garden fixtures. Whether its cascading flowers, evergreen foliage, disease resistance, or climbing nature - cross vine is an amazing plant species that will add drama and beauty to your garden.
